body:
Locks added to `init.cpp` due to the following locking requirements (needed for #11226):
1. reading the value pointed to by `pblocktree` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading the value pointed to by `pblocktree` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variable `mapBlockIndex` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading the value pointed to by `pcoinsdbview` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading the value pointed to by `pcoinsTip` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variable `chainActive` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variable `chainActive` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variable `chainActive` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variables `mapBlockIndex` and `chainActive` require holding mutex `cs_main`

Locks added to `validation.cpp` due to the following locking requirements:
1. reading variable `scriptExecutionCache` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. writing variable `fCheckForPruning` requires holding mutex `cs_LastBlockFile` exclusively
1. reading variable `mapBlockIndex` requires holding mutex `cs_main`
1. reading variable `nLastBlockFile` requires holding mutex `cs_LastBlockFile`
1. reading variables `mapBlockIndex` and `chainActive` require holding mutex `cs_main`
1. writing variable `nLastBlockFile` requires holding mutex `cs_LastBlockFile` exclusively
1. writing variable `nBlockSequenceId` requires holding mutex `cs_nBlockSequenceId` exclusively
title: Add missing locks to init.cpp (in AppInitMain + ThreadImport) and validation.cpp
